channel.title: 667 Dropping Errors

item.title: 667 Dropping Errors
item.dc:creator: @13lack_drag 13lack drag
item.description:
@13lack_drag wrote:

I have two dropping errors that i cannot figure out.

  1. A person cannot see you drop an item; It stays invisible to them until is disapears. Here is my floor item class:

[code=java]package com.rs.game.item;

import com.rs.game.WorldTile;
import com.rs.game.player.Player;

@SuppressWarnings(“serial”)
public class FloorItem extends Item {

private WorldTile tile;
private Player owner;
private boolean invisible;
private boolean grave;

public FloorItem(int id) {
	super(id);
}

public void setAmount(int amount) {
	this.amount = amount;
}

public FloorItem(Item item, WorldTile tile, Player owner,
		boolean underGrave, boolean invisible) {
	super(item.getId(), item.getAmount());
	this.tile = tile;
	this.owner = owner;
	grave = underGrave;
	this.invisible = invisible;
}

public WorldTile getTile() {
	return tile;
}

public boolean isGrave() {
	return grave;
}

public boolean isInvisible() {
	return invisible;
}

public Player getOwner() {
	return owner;
}

public void setInvisible(boolean invisible) {
	this.invisible = invisible;
}

}
[/code]

2.) The other problem I am having is that if you kill an npc, and you move, the drop will not show. I have no clue on that one.

Read full topic
